Later, the government was asked to reduce the price of gasoline at the pump: I thought that this ia a capitalist society and the market sets the price? Why is the American calling on the government?

So, then, as a stunt (i'm sure) Biden announces the release of 5 Million barrels of oil from the strategic reserve. Again, the moron American believed this and calmed down. Now, I'm seeing mid-term election ads that are stating that one canidate or another will lower the price of gasoline if elected. The American is an imbecile and appear to eating it up.
